plot: Our hero is Murphy, an ET hunter; a real, bona fide, bob's your uncle hunter. But he has a big problem: nothing ever works like it's supposed to...especially when he is trying to catch Puck...
plot_en: Our hero is Murphy, an ET hunter; a real, bona fide, bob's your uncle hunter. But he has a big problem: nothing ever works like it's supposed to...especially when he is trying to catch Puck...

title: Bugged
